title: The Man that gravity forgot
creator_credit: Wijnand Nieuwenkam, Auricom Van Gelber and Coronet
brief_description: An animated film about the life of Bram, the only person in the world who is not affected by the force of gravity. As Bram narrates this account of his gravity-free life he presents basic scientific information about gravity, and reveals the important role that this force plays in our lives.
creator_credit_for_label: Wijnand Nieuwenkam, Auricom Van Gelber and Coronet
